price: 124. Dan barang siapa mengerjakan amal kebajikan, baik laki-laki maupun perempuan sedang dia beriman, maka mereka itu akan masuk ke dalam surga dan mereka tidak dizalimi sedikit pun.
arabic: وَمَن يَعۡمَلۡ مِنَ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتِ مِن ذَكَرٍ أَوۡ أُنثَىٰ وَهُوَ مُؤۡمِنٞ فَأُوْلَٰٓئِكَ يَدۡخُلُونَ ٱلۡجَنَّةَ وَلَا يُظۡلَمُونَ نَقِيرٗا

version.title: Indonesian Translation - Sabeq Company
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by Sabeq Company, printed in 2016. corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: waman yaʿmal mina al-ṣāliḥāti min dhakarin aw unthā wahuwa mu'minun fa-ulāika yadkhulūna al-janata walā yuẓ'lamūna naqīran
translations: (even as much as) the speck on a date-seed
